name: Dashing Dinos
description: Cute Dinosaurs battle against each other on slippery surfaces in this intense, local multiplayer party game. Choose your favorite tiny Dino, dominate your friends in several game modes and use the unique DASH ability to guarantee your win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended
